attributes.action: Parliament should forego the 2016 summer recess
attributes.additional_details:
If this was a business or organisation all leave would be cancelled until a plan was formulated to move forward in a constructive manner, Parliament should be no exception. 
This is not a Remain or Brexit matter, it is about ensuring the UK comes through this crisis as a united and strong country for the good of us all.
attributes.background: Parliament need to put together a plan to take the UK through the negotiations following the referendum to leave the EU.  The Conservative party should quickly decide on the leadership to prevent the UK being rudderless for any longer than necessary.
